title: BARD - Elon Buys Twitter & SF Chronicle Covers Homelessness
itunes:title: BARD - Elon Buys Twitter & SF Chronicle Covers Homelessness
description:
Adam and Mark link up remotely with Mark sporting a brand new setup and they dive into the hysterical reactions coming to the news that Elon Musk has purchased Twitter. They also discuss some coverage of the homelessness issues facing San Francisco as reported by their paper of record, The San Francisco Chronicle. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
